snippet.title: Pokémon Wave Hello (Pixel 4 Tech Demo)
snippet.description:
Apologies for the glitchy video, it was from the screen recorder.
This was a tech demo Google made in collaboration with Nintendo when the Pixel 4 first launched. It was to demonstrate the capabilities of Project Soli, which the Pixel 4 was the first and last phone to ever have this radar sensor built in. I never saw a video of the actual hand movements when interacting with the demo, so I made a video showing them in the upper right hand corner. This demo is a neat party trick, but it is nothing more than that...
The extra bit at the end shows an alternate version of the Pikachu demo. It is only accessible through the menu.
For those wondering, this demo will work on a non Pixel 4 device, but it will throw a "motion bridge not found" error. It can be bypassed and the actions in the demo can be performed with the touch screen instead.
